name: Duel Attack
overview: The border areas between two warring nations have always been the hottest and those where the two powers are measured most strenuously. You are part of one of them and your task is to destroy as many enemy combat units as possible. At the beginning you have to choose whether to fly a helicopter or an airplane (by pressing the joystick one or two respectively) or both of them to play together with a friend. The two vehicles have different firing volumes but it is always essential to be precise and quick moving for the enemy does not wait! Published in Italy as both Duel Attack and Guerra Confine.
